roleset.name: to sicken or repel, causing disgust
roleset.note: DISGUST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'disgust' based on WSJ; adjectival 'disgusting' based on BOLT-2,3;adjectival 'disgusted' based on BOLT-6. Member of VNcls amuse-31.1. (from disgust.01-v)
DISGUST-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. (from disgust.01-n)
DISGUSTING-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from disgusting.01-j)
DISGUSTED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from disgusted.01-j)

example.name: disgust-v: passive
example.text: Or maybe they-1 are disgusted [*-1] by the literal-minded musical score ; when a character arrives at a major decision [*T*-3]her thoughts are revealed [*-2] by the sound of `` I Can See Clearly Now . ''

example.name: disgusting-j
example.text: I did write a note on the bill that said that the language I heard was disgusting and hateful and that I would not patronize that restaurant again .

example.name: disgusting-j
example.text: I have to admit manually moving shit through massage is terrifyingly disgusting to me .

example.name: disgusted-j
example.text: It seems people are not as disgusted with the thief so much after they realize the thief 's work can fight corruption .
example.arg: after they realize the thief's work can fight corruption

example.name: disgust-n
example.text: Fashionista nephew expresses his disgust at the idea of blue salopettes.
example.arg: at the idea of blue salopettes
